Ekow Mensah bụ onye ọchụnta ego na onye na-ekwu okwu na Ghana bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke The African Network of Entrepreneurs (TANOE).
A mụrụ Mensah na Takoradi na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Ghana.  O nwetara nzere na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Sayensị na Nkà na ụzụ Kwame Nkrumah dị na Kumasi, Ghana.  Ekow Mensah lụrụ Oriakụ A.J Mensah.

Dị ka onye isi oche nke The African Network of Entrepreneurs, ọ na-elekọta netwọk 5 na ọrụ 6 nke na-etinye aka na ọrụ dị iche iche na-emetụta Ghana. Networklọ ọrụ ndị ọchụnta ego nke Africa na-ejide ihe karịrị ndị ọchụnta ego 1750 n'ofe Africa ọkachasị na Ghana, Nigeria, South Africa, Uganda, Liberia, Kenya na Zambia.  Ọ malitere n'oge na-adịbeghị anya ụlọ ọrụ nka nka nke mbụ Ghana na ebe a na-arụkọ ọrụ, nke a maara dị ka TANOE Hub nke na-enye ohere na akụrụngwa maka ihe okike na Accra, Ghana.

N'oge na-adịbeghị anya, Premium Bank Ghana Ltd họpụtara Ekow ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Board of the Ghana Startup Awards. Ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ onwe ya na British Council Ghana na DwellWorks, USA na ndị nkuzi sonyere na mmemme YALI West Africa na ụmụ akwụkwọ nke Mahadum Ashesi.
E bipụtara edemede ya banyere Onye isi ala Donald Trump nke ọma ma tụọ aro ya n'ofe Afrịka.
N'afọ 2015, Avance Media họpụtara Mensah n'etiti ndị ntorobịa Ghana 50 kachasị nwee mmetụta ma Coca-Cola mechara mata ya n'etiti Ndị ntorobịa 60 na Ghana.
